#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start Your Own Music Venue

#Text=If you went to a club one night and did n't like the music , atmosphere or the people and thought about creating your own music venue but just do n't know where to start , here is your guide to how to start your own music venue .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Make A Budget .
#Text=Your budget should be reasonable , affordable , and definitely not all your pocket money even if you plan to do this professionally .
#Text=Have An Idea of What The Venue Is Going To Be Like .

#Text=If you want a jazzy smokey kind of venue then you want a bar and a bit of attitude to go along so you 're not going to have kids running around and pop music which will come in to be very important .
#Text=Buy Property .
#Text=Unless you 're running a household venue then your going to need property in a central and/or visible location , i.e. downtown , where a lot of people visit .
#Text=Remember : if you 're running a pop style venue DO NOT put your venue in a shadier part of town who do n't have the same taste of music .
#Text=Get the property next to young places like Mrs. Tiggley Wiggles . ( Very very sorry this was a horrible example but it is a smart idea . )
#Text=Start A Design - Very important .
#Text=This is where your personality comes in and your budget .
#Text=No matter what kind of place your running you do n't want it to be bare .
#Text=You want style , friendly outgoing style that reflects the music and feel of the bar .
#Text=Draw what you want the bar to look like and then purchase the items according to what space you have of the venue .
#Text=Advertise You still want advertisements even if your downtown .
#Text=Put out advertisements through street poles , by word , or even television .
#Text=Also have a very bright entrance to your venue . people will notice the lights and automatically look and feel the vibes .
#Text=Start Hiring .
#Text=You want bartenders , custodians and all of those . remember that there has to be a contract made legally .
#Text=You might even want to do this all yourself or get help from friends .
#Text=And Make sure everyone you hire is easy-going so the people who enter are more comfortable .
#Text=Hire Musicians .
#Text=This is the time to hire musicians .
#Text=Hire musicians that reflect the feel of the rest of the venue .
#Text=ONLY hire bands that you have heard or seen before so when you do ask for or get asked for always ask for a press kit .
#Text=Also only hire bands that are trustworthy .
#Text=No heavy drinkers or druggies .
#Text=This will of course will be bad business and you will have to guess when they 're coming .
#Text=Keep Track Of Everything .
#Text=This is what you will have to do because you will have less chance of getting sued or have any other accidents happen .
#Text=You will also see where the money is going and also keep track of trends that are happening so you can put them in the advertisements .
#Text=Take Lots Of Pictures And Videos And Sponsor Events .
#Text=This will help support your venue by creating a way for people to feel connected .
#Text=Go there yourself And With Friends .
#Text=This will help you see the outlook of your venue and see what other people see .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Be Nice To Other Venue Managers And Ask Them On Tips
#Text=Always Be Willing To Go To Your Own Venue
#Text=Never Let the Venue Take Over Your Life
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't Let Money Get In The Way Of Any Thing
#Text=You will never get the best location due to other venues
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=A Location Downtown
#Text=A Good Attitude
